Token.Abstract: Classes that adopt this protocol gain the ability to be stored in the NSUserDefaults as strings. This allows native objects to be stored using the variable's userDefaultsName mechanism.
Constructs and returns a new, autoreleased instance of the receiver. The returned object's internal state will be set based on the value of the passed-in string.

ReturnValue.Abstract: a new instance of the receiver

Token.Abstract: Returns a string representation of the object's internal state.

ReturnValue.Abstract: a string that, if passed to fromStringValue:, would return a new instance that isEqual: to this receiver.
